name: Comfort Inn Near Pasadena Civic Auditorium

reviews.text: We Stayed this motel for 3 days,the front desk lady was very friendly.Our room was on 3rd floor,they have elevator so we didn't have any problem to take our luaggage to our room.When we entered our room,the first impression is clean,i found some detail that show they care the bussiness: they have paper plates on the top of the microwave,swivel magnification mirror onthe wall,the bath room was clean too.About the breakfast,I think it's good and lots of choices.The location is very good,short drive to old town pasadena,about this area I'd like to recommend a restrurant, Mi Piace,good atmosphere,don't think it's expensive ,just like olive garden but the quality is beyond that.I had an pumpkin ravioli and it's excellent.
reviews.title: Nice Motel,will come back
The worst
reviews.text: I always remind myself what you got is what you paid,this motel is exactly what I should get for about $80/night in this area.

reviews.title: Still great...
reviews.text: They might as well have just put some linens on the floor - the bed was that hard - I put their ugly decorative pillow on the matress and tried to sleep on them. I didn't get any sleep.
The rooms are clean and modern and the prices are low! this is more then I can ask for, have been here before and will be here again. The breakfast is wonderful too.
reviews.title: Comfortable in Comfort Inn. Free Wireless

reviews.text: Do not hesitate to make a reservation here!
reviews.title: Good Value, Great for Families
Unsafe
reviews.text: Stayed here on 2/5/05, the place was not clean, no working phone in our room. This is a run down motel with unsavory characters as guests. We left after 1 night.
Rooms are big & clean. Breakfast is good. Staff is helpful & friendly. We will stay here again!
reviews.title: Great deal!
Great Value
reviews.text: Very clean, well kept. Front desk was helpful & friendly. Bus route to Old Town Pasadena goes right in front of hotel on Colorado. We were very pleased with our stay. Will stay there again during our next trip to LA.

reviews.title: As Good As Saga Used to Be!
reviews.text: Until my trip in June 2003, I'd stayed at the Saga since my first trip to California in July 1970. (Yes, the Saga is that old!) But, I'd seen the warning signs and decided to give the CI a try. It's clean and very comfortable. Great location, too. The only downer was the gonging in the evening from the building next door... You can feel the vibrations in the parking lot!!!

reviews.title: Pleased with Comfort Inn
reviews.text: The Comfort Inn Pasadena was clean, comfortable, and affordable. We were pleased with the location as well...near Old Town Pasadena. Our son lives in South Pasadena, and this was our first visit to the LA area. We wouldn't hesitate to recommend this hotel as a medium priced and clean place to stay when in Pasadena. The continental breakfast included in the cost of the room was an added benefit as well.

Stayed at the Comfort Inn in Pasadena for 3 nights during Christmas week. It was a nice motor inn, nothing fancy, but had everything you needed. The complementary breakfast every morning was nice. Had different varieties of breads, make your own waffles, oatmeal and cereals, hard boiled eggs, yogurts, juices and milk and different fruits. The place wasn't noisy. It seems to cater to an older clientele. We were travelling with our 9 month old, so really nice to have a fridge and microwave in the room. The complaints we did have were that there were ants in the room and the crib they gave us was pretty dirty.
reviews.title: Had a nice stay

reviews.text: Booked the Comfort Inn from the choicehotels website. Great place to stay for the money
reviews.title: Great place to stay, great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Great Place To Stay!

likes.liked: — The rooms were spacious and clean.
likes.disliked: — The front desk staff when we were checking out was on the phone and ignored us for over 15 minutes.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Good stay!
A great value with lots of extras

likes.liked: — cute room, huge tv, great breakfast
likes.disliked: — Facility is old and needs some cosmetic refurbishing- paint rough in spots

description: Located about 2.5miles East of Old Town Pasadena. Other attractions Nearby includes Huntington Library (0.5mi.), Caltech (1mi.), ROSE Bowl (4 miles). Universal Studios, Disneyland, Knotts Berry Farm, Six Flags Magic Mountain, and LAX are all located around (31 miles away). The property offers free Hot breakfast every morning, as well as, free wired/wireless Hi Speed Internet, and free parking. Outdoor Swimming Pool, Jacuzzi, and Fitness center are available within the property. Guest will also enjoy in-room amenities such as Flat Screen TV, Refrigerator, Microwave, Hair Dryer, and In-room Coffee Maker.
